title: New River Gorge National River: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Closures in effect due to flooding  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Closures in effect due to flooding  Nuttallburg Road and Nuttallburg are open. Keeneys Creek Rail Trail and Nuttallburg Conveyor Trail remain closed.  The road to upper Glade Creek is not recommended. Kate's Plateau Trail is closed at the beginning from Upper Glade access.     Information        Portions of Rend Trail closed for Bridge Repairs  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Portions of Rend Trail closed for Bridge Repairs  Portions of the Rend Trail, formerly known as the Thurmond Minden Trail, will be closed effective immediately due to safety concerns. more          Kaymoor Trail Closure  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Kaymoor Trail Closure  The slope above a portion of the Kaymoor Trail in New River Gorge National River has become unstable, forcing the park to temporarily close the trail from the Wolf Creek Trailhead at Highway 82 (Fayette Station Road) to the Kaymoor Miners Trail. more          Turkey Spur Closed  Alert 3 , Severity ,information ,, Turkey Spur Closed  The boardwalk and stairs to Turkey Spur Overlook were destroyed in a fire and remain closed. The road to Turkey Spur and the Grandview Rim Trail are both open to the Turkey Spur parking lot.          Fayette Station Road  Alert 4 , Severity ,information ,, Fayette Station Road  Expect temporary delays on the Fayette Station road, Thursday, August 11 from 8:00 am to 12 noon on the south side near the Tunny Hunsucker bridge to facilitate improvements to the river access. Traffic should resume uninterrupted during the afternoon.
